hero.subtitle: Master any skill or subject with personalized, interactive exercises designed to make learning fast, easy, and fun.

metadata.title: Use AI to learn anything
metadata.description: Create interactive courses using artificial intelligence like ChatGPT to learn any subject or skill you want.

waitlist.title: Get 15% Off for a Year
waitlist.description: Sign up for the waitlist and lock in 15% off for an entire year. No catch—just a thank you for being one of the first to join. This is offer is valid for individuals and teams.
